foreignData.name: Marionettenskelett
foreignData.text: {2}{B}{B}: Entferne das Marionettenskelett und eine Kreatur Deiner Wahl ganz aus dem Spiel. Der Beherrscher dieser Kreatur kann 2 bezahlen, um diese Fähigkeit zu neutralisieren. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn das Marionettenskelett auf Deinem Friedhof ist.

name: Carrionette
originalText:
o2o
Bo
B: Remove Carrionette and target creature from the game. That creature's controller may pay o2 to counter this ability. Use this ability only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.

rulings.text: Since it is exiled as part of the effect and not part of the cost, you can activate its ability more than once.
A creature with Protection from Creatures can’t be targeted by this card’s ability.

text: {2}{B}{B}: Exile Carrionette and target creature unless that creature's controller pays {2}. Activate only if Carrionette is in your graveyard.
